definition: not allowing oneself much in the way of food or drink; moderate
sentence: His abstemious lifestyle helped him maintain his health.

definition: lack of harmony among musical notes or a tension or clash resulting from the combination of two disharmonious elements
sentence: The dissonance in his arguments made them difficult to follow.
The company's egregious disregard for safety regulations resulted in a disaster.
The complex puzzle flummoxed even the most experienced players.

definition: a person who attacks or criticizes cherished beliefs or institutions
sentence: The iconoclast challenged the traditional views of the community.

definition: so foolish, unreasonable, or out of place as to be amusing
sentence: The ludicrous proposal was quickly dismissed by the committee.

definition: a person who is new to a subject or activity
sentence: As a neophyte in the art world, she was eager to learn.

definition: tending to induce drowsiness or sleep
sentence: The lecture was so soporific that many students fell asleep.

definition: the state of being everywhere at once
sentence: The ubiquity of smartphones has changed how we communicate.

definition: a change of circumstances or fortune, typically one that is unwelcome or unpleasant
sentence: The vicissitudes of life can be challenging.
